algorithm: # New algorithm description: The "Modified Exponential Algorithm" assigns scores to the bins by taking the exponential of the ratio of the item size to the remaining capacity of the bins, aiming to prioritize bins with larger remaining capacity and minimize the number of used bins by assigning the item to the bin with the maximum score.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item: int, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    # Calculate the ratio of item size to remaining bin capacity
    ratios = item / bins
    
    # Calculate the scores using the exponential of the ratios
    scores = np.exp(ratios)
    
    return scores
